name: cookingTimer_getRemainingTime
description: This function is used to get the remaining cooking time of a specific appliance compartment.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device whose remaining cooking time is being checked.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The specific compartment of the device for which the remaining cooking time is being checked.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: The group action related to the devices.
